hero.headline: Empowering the Next Generation Through Culture and Technology
hero.description: A free pioneering digital learning hub that blends innovation with identity. From coding and creativity to professional skills, we make learning accessible in both Yor√πb√° and English.

step1.title: 1. Apply for Admission
step1.desc: Start your journey by applying for admission to join Yoruba Tech Space.

step2.title: 2. Get Admitted
step2.desc: Once admitted, download your ID card and Admission Letter then Proceed to your Dashboard

step3.title: 3. Start Learning
step3.desc: Learn HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, and more in your preferred language.

step4.title: 4. Take Quizzes & Practical Tasks
step4.desc: Practice what you learn through quizzes and real coding projects.

step5.title: 5. Earn Badges & Certificate
step5.desc: Receive badges and a certificate to showcase your skills and progress.

courses.title: Our Courses
courses.description: Learn from beginner to pro with hands-on projects.

admissionCTA.title: üöÄ Your tech journey starts here.
admissionCTA.description: ü§ù Get admitted into Yor√πb√° Tech Space today.

about.title: About Us ‚Äì Yoruba Tech Space
about.description1: I am a software developer with a strong passion for technology and translating it into Yoruba to make learning accessible for all Yoruba speakers.
about.description2: Yoruba Tech Space was created to bring coding education closer to our culture, language, and identity. We want culture and technology to walk hand in hand.
about.description3: Our mission is to empower young minds to learn HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Python, Artificial Intelligence e.t.c. in Yoruba with ease and excitement.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.text: To become a global platform teaching technology to Yoruba speakers and Africans in their native languages, removing language and financial barriers.

educate1Million.title: Educate 10 Million Africans
educate1Million.text: We aim to teach one million African youths to code in their native languages through free or affordable tech education.

grassrootsCampaign.title: Grassroots Tech Campaign
grassrootsCampaign.text: We‚Äôll reach schools, churches, mosques, and rural communities to spread digital awareness and create tech hubs.

buildTechTribe.title: Build a Tech Tribe
buildTechTribe.text: We are building a global family of tech learners and educators collaborating and growing together.

culturallyRooted.title: Culturally Rooted Education
culturallyRooted.text: We believe education should reflect culture. Our lessons blend local traditions and tech for meaningful learning.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.errorMessage: ‚ö†Ô∏è Your message could not be sent. Please try again.

footer.tagline: Let‚Äôs learn coding with our language, culture, and new vision.

donation.englishMsg: Your donation helps us train African talents in technology using their native language. Together, we can help them gain skills to provide for their families and contribute to the tech world.

firebase.title: Firebase
firebase.description: Learn how to use Firebase for authentication, Firestore, and hosting. Build backend functionality with ease.

htmlcss.title: HTML and CSS
htmlcss.description: This course will teach you how to build web pages using HTML and CSS. We will cover structure, formatting, layout, colors, and responsiveness. All explained clearly in English!
htmlcss.exampleParagraph: This is my very first webpage.

javascript.title: JavaScript
javascript.description: This JavaScript course will help you build powerful web applications. You will learn variables, functions, arrays, and DOM manipulation.

reactNative.title: React Native
reactNative.description: This course teaches you how to build mobile apps with React Native. We'll cover components, state, props, navigation, and deploying to Android and iOS.

git.title: Git & GitHub
git.description: This course teaches you how to use Git and GitHub for version control, collaborating with others, and saving your work safely.
